name: LockMyPix Vault
summary: A LOCKMYPIX file is an encrypted vault created by fourchars LockMyPix, a mobile app used to protect private photos, videos, and documents. It contains usersâ€™ sensitive content that they have added to the app. LOCKMYPIX files are similar to folders, acting as a single, secure unit that contains content inaccessible without the correct password or authentication method, such as face recognition or a fingerprint.
